data.message: I was in elementary school when you first came out didn't realize how fucking sick it was I wish I was a little older when that happened. Anyways I'm an addict and these cravings are a bitch I wish you could be my sponsor lol the only thing that makes me happy is freestyling or writing n shit. I know you probly hear this everyday... Jk jk I play, nobody's safe, you bout to get sprayed with this.. Lyrical AK I can go for 8 days I'm dangerous my raps are like speaking different languages wasup. Ok sry lol like you're even gonna read this
